works.description: Hardly a day has passed after Samsung announced it would introduce its Wi-Fi-connected fridges in the U.S. and Korea, and LG has come up with its first connected Smart Grid-ready DIOS Fridge for the Korean market. Owners of the new smart refrigerator will be able to access updates and information via smartphones and tablets. The fridge comes with three powerful smart savings options - Late night saving, Preferable time saving and the Smart Grid-ready. The Smart Adapt features let users update their refrigerator software with the latest upgrades, features and options.
